Package com.treasure.hunt.game

Class GameEngine

java.lang.Object
com.treasure.hunt.game.GameEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
HideAndSeekGameEngine, InsecureGameEngine, ObstacleGameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
This is the engine which runs a simulation of a treasure hunt.

      Returns:

    • init

      public Move init()

    • move

      public Move move()
      This simulates just one step of the simulation. The searcher begins since we want not force him, to take a initial hint, he eventually do not need, f.e. if he works randomized!

      Updates the searchers position.

      Returns:
      the Move, happened in this step.

      Parameters:

      initialSearcherPosition - initial searcher position
      Throws:
